javastuff.gyromaze

Class Game.Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • javastuff.gyromaze.Game.Engine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.hardware.SensorEventListener, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    Enclosing class:
    Game

    class Game.Engine
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener
    Game engine. Captures sensor's values, on each frame updates ball's position and resolves collisions with coins, holes, walls and boundaries.

      private Game.Side getCollisionSide(Wall w)
      Returns side with which we collided Computes shortest distance from the old ball's position, decides which side of the wall is the closest Inner walls raise a problem as the should not be handled as real walls, but they exist and the shortest distance might point to them In that case, we try to check whether the checked wall is hidden or not

      • isWallCovered

        private boolean isWallCovered(Wall w,
                              Game.Side s,
                              Game.Side second)
        Decides whether the wall found is inner or outer wall
        Parameters:
        w - Wall we want to check
        s - What side we want to check
        second - The second side that is to decide
        Returns:
        True if the wall is inner, false otherwise

      • getCollisionSide

        private Game.Side getCollisionSide(Wall w)
        Returns side with which we collided Computes shortest distance from the old ball's position, decides which side of the wall is the closest Inner walls raise a problem as the should not be handled as real walls, but they exist and the shortest distance might point to them In that case, we try to check whether the checked wall is hidden or not
        Parameters:
        w - Wall that we intersected with
        Returns:
        Side of intersection
